title: Print, "A Bivouac Fire on the Potomac River, from Harper's Weekly, December 21, 1861, pp. 744-745.", December 21, 1861
medium: Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.
signed: Signed on block, lower left: Homer.
description: Horizontal night scene with a group of soldiers seated and standing around a fire, as one soldier dances in front of the fire and two others play cards, at lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "A Bivouac Fire on the Potomac River, from Harper's Weekly, December 21, 1861, pp. 744-745.", December 21, 1861.
December 21, 1861. Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.. Gift of Arthur B. Carlson. 1951-93-7.
